p: The novel finding of PheWAS associations of ABI3 variant is of most interest. Rare variant (rs616338, p.Ser209Phe, p = 4.56 × 10 −10, OR = 1.43, MAF cases = 0.011, MAF controls = 0.008) in ABI3 was previously reported, and ABI3 is specifically expressed in microglia ( S2 Fig, similar expression pattern in human compared to other AD genes implicated by human genetics including TREM2, HLA-DRB1, PLCG2, SORL1, SCIMP, and MS4A6A) and thought to play a role in microglia-mediated innate immunity in AD [ 69]. Given its role in immune response, the PheWAS association with asthma is not completely unexpected, and its association with cardiovascular traits might reflect the role of immune dysregulation on those disease processes.
